text: Jon Rahm Rodr√≠guez (born 10 November 1994) is a Spanish professional golfer. He was the number one golfer in the World Amateur Golf Ranking for a record 60 weeks. He became a pro in 2016. He later became world number 1 in the Official World Golf Ranking by winning the Memorial Tournament in July 2020. In June 2021, Rahm won the U.S. Open and also became the first Spanish golfer to do so. Rahm was born in Barrika, Basque Country. He has some Swiss ancestry. He lives in Scottsdale, Arizona, United States. He married Kelley Cahill, an American, in 2019. The couple have a son. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * *John Rahm Biography, Info also Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Golfers Category:People from the Basque Country Category:Spanish sportspeople
title: Jon Rahm
